topic.title: Medication Use None Known - conformance rules

lines.i: The recommended approach to stating no known medications is to use the appropriate nullFlavor instead of this template. See "Unknown Information" in Section 1. This template indicates that the subject is not known to be on any medications.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7559, CONF:10508 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.29"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7557)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7558)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7560)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7561)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7563)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7562)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7565)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="182904002" Drug treatment unknown (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:7564)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15580)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15581)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15582)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7557)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7558)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7560)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7561)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7565)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7562)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7563)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="182904002" Drug treatment unknown (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:7564)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15580)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15581)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15582)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.29"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="970203173"/> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="Assertion"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation>
